text: John Piper could mean: * John Piper (author) (born 1953), English author and market analyst * John Piper (artist) (1903–1992), English painter and printmaker * John Piper (broadcaster), BBC radio host * John Piper (military officer) (1773–1851), lieutenant-governor of Norfolk Island * John Piper (theologian) (born 1946), Reformed pastor and author
title: John Piper
